description: AI video generation platform with voice cloning, static ad studio, and Apple product page builder

phases.phase1_foundation: Remotion setup, content briefs, basic TTS
phases.phase4_text_to_video: T2V models, avatar generation, Modal deployment
phases.phase5_static_ads: Remotion Static Ad Studio with templates and batch rendering
phases.phase6_apple_pages: App Store product page builder with CPP and PPO
